titles: Two treatises of government in the former, the false principles and foundation of Sir Robert Filmer and his followers are detected and overthrown, the latter is an essay concerning the true original, extent, and end of civil government.
author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.
notes: Attributed to John Locke. Cf. DNB.
Later published as: Two treatises of civil government.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
